# Diploi

> Diploi is an all-in-one platform for developing and deploying full-stack applications without the need for virtual machines, manual CI/CD setup, SSL handling, load balancing, or other DevOps complexities. Diploi combines the deployment experience of Vercel and the remote development capabilites of GitHub Codespaces in a single place. Currently Diploi allows users to build applications with Django, Hono, Next.js, SvelteKit, React-Vite, Bun, Node, Astro, Nue.js, Ghost CMS, PostgreSQL, Redis, Mongo, MariaDB and MinIO.
